article_title: Do Conservatives Only Oppose Big-Government Health Care Schemes When Proposed By Democrats?

article_metadata.description: Conservatives outright reject the idea that big-government gun-control schemes would reduce mass shootings like the recent murders allegedly committed by Robert Dear at a Planned Parenthood clinic in Colorado Springs. So why do so many seem to believe a big-government mental-health-care scheme, like the bill sponsored by psychologist and congressman Tim Murphy (R-PA), would be any more effective?
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
